[Y]Graphics Basics
[W]Choose the right mode for the job.
[c][m.]
[W]Mode choices affect colour count,
[W]detail and readability.
[W]Redraw only changed areas when
[W]possible to reduce flicker and cost.
[c][m.]
[G]- Mode 0: bold art.
[G]- Mode 1: balanced.
[G]- Mode 2: crisp text.
[m][m-]
[Y]ART START
[C]Start readable, then add flair.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
